CREATE TABLE wp_postmark_log ( id INT(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, log_entry_date datetime DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00' NOT NULL, fromaddress text, toaddress text, subject text, response text, PRIMARY KEY id (id) ) DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4
